## Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap: Big Flavor in Every Bite
Some combos just make sense—like crispy bacon, juicy grilled chicken, and creamy ranch dressing! The Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap at Potbelly delivers all that deliciousness in a warm, multi-grain lavash flatbread.

Every bite is packed with applewood smoked bacon, all-natural grilled chicken, melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, and fresh tomato, all tied together with buttermilk ranch dressing. It's the ultimate crave-worthy wrap—savory, cheesy, and oh-so-satisfying.

## Make It a Meal
Take your wrap experience to the next level! Add a [Farmhouse Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/farmhouse-salad) for a crisp, classic bite, or try the [Apple Walnut Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/apple-walnut-salad) for a touch of sweetness.

## Sweet Finishes Await
Why stop at savory? Treat yourself to one of our signature desserts—whether it’s a gooey [Chocolate Brownie Cookie](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/chocolate-brownie-cookie) or a [Bag of Mini Cookies](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/bag-of-mini-cookies), it’s the perfect ending to your Potbelly feast.

## Southwest Avo Chicken Wrap: Smoky, Crunchy & Full of Flavor
Love bold flavors with a little crunch? The Southwest Avo Chicken Wrap at Potbelly brings all the heat and zest you crave! This flavor-packed wrap features all-natural grilled chicken, creamy avocado, and melted provolone cheese, all wrapped in a soft, warm multigrain lavash flatbread. Crispy tortilla strips, fresh lettuce, juicy tomato, and onion add the perfect bite, while our smoky chipotle lime sauce ties it all together with a zesty, tangy kick.

## Upgrade Your Meal
Want the full wrap experience? Pair your wrap with a [Chicken Salad Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/chicken-salad-salad) or try the [Apple Walnut Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/apple-walnut-salad) for a touch of sweetness!

## Save Room for Something Sweet
After all that savory goodness, treat yourself to a [Sugar Cookie](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/sugar-cookie) or a [6-Pack Cookie Box](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/6-pack-cookie-box) (we won’t tell if you don’t share!) for the perfect sweet finish to your Potbelly meal.

seo.headline: Wrap
seo.readMoreCopy:
## Wrap It Up with Potbelly 
Looking for a fresh, flavorful meal that doesn’t skimp on satisfaction? You’ve come to the right place. Potbelly’s wrap menu is packed with bold flavors, hearty ingredients, and options that are perfect for lunch, dinner, or whenever hunger strikes. 

Whether you’re searching for “wraps near me” or just want something delicious delivered straight to your door, our wraps are here to save the day. With crave-worthy options like the Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap and the Southwest Avo Chicken Wrap, we’ve got something for everyone. 

## Explore Our Favorites 
Not sure which wrap to try first? Here’s a closer look at some of our fan favorites: 

Take the __Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap__, for example—it’s loaded with grilled chicken, crispy bacon, shredded cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and ranch dressing, all wrapped up in a perfectly soft tortilla. It’s a classic combo that never goes out of style. 

Or try the __Southwest Avo Chicken Wrap__, where smoky southwest flavors meet creamy avocado. This wrap features grilled chicken, fresh-sliced avocado, black beans, roasted corn salsa, and chipotle ranch dressing for a flavor explosion that’ll keep you coming back for more. 

## What Makes Potbelly Wraps So Good? 
We don’t do boring wraps. At Potbelly, every wrap is made fresh to order and stuffed with premium ingredients that pack a punch of flavor in every bite. From tender chicken to crisp veggies and zesty sauces. Seriously, you can thank us later. 

## Order Wraps for Delivery or Pick Up
No time to stop by? No problem. You can get your favorite wraps delivered right to your door with just a few clicks. Whether you’re working through lunch or just don’t feel like leaving the house, we’ve got you covered. 

Prefer to pick it up yourself? Place your [order online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup) and swing by your nearest Potbelly shop to grab your freshly made wrap. It’s quick, convenient, and so good you might ‘accidentally’ forget to share.

Wait no longer - treat yourself to a wrap that’s anything but ordinary.

seo.metaDescription: Looking for bold, delicious wraps? Try Potbelly’s Chicken Bacon Ranch or Southwest Avo Chicken Wrap. Order online for delivery or pick up today!

## The BLTA: It's Like a BLT, But Better (Because Avocado) 
We took the classic BLT and gave it the Potbelly upgrade. Picture crispy Applewood smoked bacon, fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices, and hand-sliced avocado, all stacked high on our toasted bread or wrapped up in a flavorful tortilla. If you’re craving the best BLT sandwich you’ve ever had, the BLTA is here to redefine your bacon-lettuce-tomato game.

## Need a BLTA Sandwich Near Me, Like, Right Now? 
We get it – sometimes you just need a BLT. But not just any BLT, right? You want the best BLT sandwich near you - either sandwich or wrap, with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, juicy tomato, and creamy avocado. Well, guess what? You've come to the right place! Order your BLTA [online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup), and we'll deliver it to your door. 

## BLT Sandwiches for a Crowd? We've Got You Covered! 
Planning a party and need to feed a bunch of BLT lovers? Our BLTA sandwich is available as a [catering platter](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/sandwich-bundles), perfect for any gathering. We'll even throw in some delicious sides to make it a complete meal. (Psst... our [Mac & Cheese](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/mac-soups) is the perfect pairing for a BLT.) 

## Looking for Something a Little Different?  
No worries, we've got you covered! Check out our [Pizza Melt](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/pizza-melt) sandwich, with all the flavors of your favorite pizza but in sandwich form. 

## Cookies & Shakes: The Perfect BLT Pairing

seo.copyText: All-natural grilled chicken breast, crumbled blue cheese, grapes, apples, dried cranberries and candied walnuts, served on a bed of field greens with balsamic vinaigrette
seo.readMoreCopy:
## Apple Walnut Salad: Nutritious & Delicious
The Potbelly Apple Walnut Salad is a delightful blend of fresh field greens with an optional addition of tender chicken breast. Topped with crumbled blue cheese, diced apples, dried cranberries, juicy grapes, and glazed walnuts, it's a flavorful and healthy choice. Served with a tangy balsamic vinaigrette dressing, this salad is perfect for those seeking a nutritious yet delicious meal.

## Hungry for Potelly? Delivery's on the Way! 
We get it – sometimes those cravings hit hard. But don't worry, we've got you covered! Order [online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup), and we'll bring it straight to your door. No need to even change out of your PJs. (We won't judge.) 

## Potbelly Catering: Perfect for Any Gathering
Looking to feed a group? Our [catering menu](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/sandwich-bundles) includes the Apple Walnut Salad in larger sizes, ideal for office meetings, family gatherings, or any event. Your guests will love the refreshing and wholesome ingredients.

## Craving Something Heartier?
If your salad needs a hearty companion, why not add a sandwich? Try our [A Wreck](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/a-wreck) for a protein-packed bite, or go for the [Turkey Breast](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/turkey-breast) for a classic, satisfying option. It's the perfect way to round out your meal!

## Don’t Forget Dessert!
End your meal on a sweet note with one of our mouth-watering desserts! Choose from a [Chocolate Brownie Cookie](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/chocolate-brownie-cookie) or a [Bag of Mini Cookies](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/bag-of-mini-cookies) to complete your Potbelly experience.

## Chili Mac Bowl: Hearty and Comforting
Craving a warm, cheesy meal near me? The Chili Mac Bowl at Potbelly Sandwich Shop is the ultimate comfort food! Our rich and flavorful beef chili is slow-cooked with kidney beans, bell peppers, and onions, then topped with a creamy, melty three-cheese mac for the perfect balance of bold and comforting flavors.

## Available in a Hearty Bowl Size
Looking for a satisfying meal? Our Chili Mac Bowl is served in a generous portion, making it the perfect choice for lunch or dinner.

## Pair It with a Sandwich or Side
Make it a full meal by adding a Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap or a [Turkey Breast Sandwich](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/turkey-breast). Want something crunchy? Try it with a bag of Zapp’s Chips or a side of steamed veggies.

## Don’t Forget Dessert!
Round out your meal with a hand-dipped [Vanilla Shake](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/vanilla-shake), a [Chocolate Brownie Cookie](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/chocolate-brownie-cookie), or a [Bag of Mini Cookies](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/cookies-shakes/bag-of-mini-cookies) for a perfect sweet treat.

seo.readMoreCopy:
## 6-Pack Cookie Box: Freshly Baked Goodness to Share
Get ready to satisfy your sweet cravings with Potbelly’s 6-Pack Cookie Box! Whether you're a fan of the classic Oatmeal Chocolate Chip, the rich Chocolate Brownie Cookie, or the timeless Sugar Cookie, we've got you covered.

All cookies are baked fresh daily in-shop for that warm, homemade taste. Perfect for sharing (or keeping to yourself!), these 6-Pack boxes are available in your favorite flavor or as an assorted selection. Grab one today [online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup) or at your local Potbelly shop.

## Potbelly Catering: Sweets for Your Event
Planning a gathering? Then 6 isn't enough. Add a Dozen Cookies Box to your [catering order](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes)! Whether it's an office party or a family get-together, these freshly baked cookies will be a hit.

## Also In the Mood for a Sandwich?
If you’re in the mood for something savory to balance out the sweetness, try our fan-favorite [A Wreck Sandwich](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/a-wreck) or a classic [Mama's Meatball Sandwich](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/mamas-meatball). They’re the perfect complement to your sweet treat!

products.description: A Potbelly favorite!  Freshly baked oatmeal chocolate chip cookie
products.name: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookie

seo.headline: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookie
seo.copyText: A Potbelly favorite! Freshly baked oatmeal chocolate chip cookie
seo.readMoreCopy:
## Potbelly Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies: Sweet, Chewy & Totally Worth It
Ready for a cookie that gets it just right? Our Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookie is packed with wholesome oats and melty chocolate chips, baked to chewy perfection. Whether you’re pairing one with your sandwich or sneaking it as a mid-afternoon pick-me-up, these cookies are here to crush your sweet tooth cravings.

## Cookie Catering Made Right!
Hosting an office lunch or party? Don’t forget the cookies! [Potbelly's catering](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes) isn’t complete without our famous Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies—they’re crowd-pleasers for a reason. Add them to your order and watch those cookies disappear faster than you can say 'dessert time.

## Looking for Something Lighter? We’ve Got You.
Not in the mood for all-out sweetness? No problem. Balance things out with our [Farmhouse Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/farmhouse-salad) or [Powerhouse Salad](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/salads/powerhouse-salad). Packed with fresh veggies and bold flavors, they’re light and totally guilt-free (so you can still grab that cookie after).

## Sandwiches + Cookies = The Perfect Pair
Cookies and sandwiches? Now that’s a match made in food heaven. Try our classic [A Wreck](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/a-wreck) for a hearty, flavor-packed option, or keep it fresh with the [Mediterranean Sandwich](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/mediterranean). Either way, you’ll have the perfect sidekick for your sweet treat.
seo.metaTitle: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies – Order Now! | Potbelly

## Sugar Cookie: A Classic Sweet Treat
Sometimes, simplicity is the ultimate indulgence. Potbelly’s Sugar Cookie is the perfect balance of soft, buttery goodness with just the right amount of sweetness. Baked fresh in-shop every day, it’s the kind of cookie that reminds you of home. Whether you're grabbing lunch or just need a snack, treat yourself to this timeless delight.

## Potbelly Catering: Add a Sweet Touch to Your Event
Make your gathering sweeter with Potbelly's catering! Our Sugar Cookies are a must-have for dessert lovers and are perfect for any event. Order through our [catering menu](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes) for a sweet ending that everyone will love.

## Looking for Something Savory?
Complement your cookie with one of our savory sandwiches like the [Mediterranean](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/mediterranean) or [A Wreck](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/a-wreck) for the perfect balance of flavors.

## Potbelly Catering: Sweeten Up Your Event
Planning a party or gathering? Add our Chocolate Brownie Cookies to the mix for a sweet surprise your guests will love. Available through our [catering menu](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes), they’re sure to be a crowd favorite!

## Dream Bar: A Sweet, Chocolatey Escape
Craving something truly indulgent? The Dream Bar is your answer. Rich, chocolatey oatmeal combined with a luscious layer of sweet caramel makes this dessert a must-try. Perfectly baked and always fresh, it’s the sweet treat you didn’t know you needed! Order now through the Potbelly App, online, or grab one in-shop and make your day a little sweeter.

## Hungry for Potbelly? Delivery's on the Way! 
We get it – sometimes those cravings hit hard. But don't worry, we've got you covered! Order [online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup), and we'll bring it straight to your door. No need to even change out of your PJs. (We won't judge.) 

## Potbelly Catering: Dream Bars for Every Occasion
Hosting an event? Add Dream Bars to your [catering menu](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/sandwich-bundles)! These rich, chocolatey delights will leave your guests dreaming of more.

## Looking for Something Savory?
If your dessert needs a hearty companion, why not add a sandwich? Try our [A Wreck](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/a-wreck) for a protein-packed bite, or go for the [Turkey Breast](https://www.potbelly.com/menu/sandwiches/turkey-breast) for a classic, satisfying option. It's the perfect way to round out your meal!

Coffee lovers, this one’s for you. We’ve taken cold-brewed Arabica coffee and blended it with our creamy, hand-dipped vanilla ice cream to create the ultimate Cold Brew Coffee Shake. It’s smooth, bold, and just the right amount of sweet—perfect for when you need a pick-me-up or simply want to treat yourself. 

## Up Your Summer Energy 
When the summer heat kicks in, your coffee break deserves an upgrade. The Cold Brew Coffee Shake is the ultimate refreshment for sunny days. 

Perfect for hot afternoons or whenever you need a cool caffeine boost, this shake is your go-to for staying energized all summer long. One sip, and you’ll be hooked. 

## Craving a Coffee Shake? We’ll Bring It to You 
No need to leave your spot for the best coffee shake in town. Order your Cold Brew Coffee Shake [online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup), and we’ll deliver it straight to your door. Your caffeine fix has never been this easy—or this delicious. 

## Feeding a Crowd of Coffee Fans? 
Hosting an event or planning a gathering? Add our Cold Brew Coffee Shakes to your [catering order](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes)! They’re guaranteed to be a hit with anyone who loves coffee and dessert in one perfect sip.

## Sunshine Meets Crunch
Summer’s heating up, but we’ve got just the thing to cool you down. Our Oreo Shake isn’t just a treat—it’s your go-to sidekick for sunny days, backyard hangouts, and everything in between.

Whether you’re lounging by the pool or strolling through the park, this creamy, cookie-packed delight is here to keep you chill all season long. 

## Craving an Oreo Shake? We’ll Bring It to You
No need to hunt for the best Oreo milkshake—it’s right here at Potbelly. [Order online](https://www.potbelly.com/order/pickup), and we’ll deliver it straight to your door. Creamy, crunchy perfection without leaving your couch. 

## Feeding a Crowd of Cookie Lovers?
Planning a party or hosting an event? Add our Oreo Cookie Shakes to your [catering order](https://www.potbelly.com/catering/menu/cookies-shakes)! They’re guaranteed to be a hit with anyone who loves that classic cookie flavor.
